about.content: tells you about me. and also some statistics. don't know what you expected.

decide.content: give me a few items, and i'll randomly decide from one of them!
decide.usage:
`sl decide <a bunch of items, separated by commas>`
extra alias: `choose`

despacito.content:
gets *luis fonsi - despacito ft. daddy yankee*. and a few other related videos.
 see also: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLchhjXy0uG8pfrYkYFwG_IwnoR0PozqJs
despacito.usage:
use `sl despacito <optional number for specific video>`
you can also type exactly: `this is so sad play despacito`

me.content:
wait, are you talking about the command, or...?
information relating to you. your xp level, (and other fun stats)!
me.usage: use `sl me`. you can also add `full` to the end for more numbers!

help.content: gets you a list of commands, or explains what a given command does.
help.usage: you're using it right now, genius. `sl help <optional command>`

ping.content:
> pong!
returns ping from bot to discord. s'bout it.

shutdown.content: shuts down slabbot. **this is an admin-only command** - this only works if you're listed as an owner of the bot.
